message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. I want to assure you that I've checked it thoroughly and it's in great condition. Would you like to take a chance and buy it?
I'll take a chance and buy the product.

I'm glad you were willing to take a chance last time! Unfortunately, it seems like this one might not be as great. I've noticed that the packaging is a bit worn out, and I'm not sure if it's been stored properly. Would you like to buy it for $100?
I'm not feeling lucky today, I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand, sometimes you just need to wait for the right one. This product is actually a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I'm willing to offer you a special deal. If you buy it, I'll throw in a free inspection report, so you'll know exactly what you're getting. Would you like to take a closer look?
I'll take a chance and buy the product, and I appreciate the offer of the free inspection report.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last one! This product is a real gem, and I'm confident you'll love it. I've had it appraised by a third-party expert, and they've given it a perfect score. It's a rare find, and I think it's worth every penny of the $100. Would you like to make it yours?
I'll take a chance and buy the product, given the expert appraisal and the perfect score.

I'm glad you're on a roll! This product has been thoroughly inspected and certified by multiple experts, and it's been in high demand lately. I've also included a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try it out risk-free. Would you like to add it to your collection for $100?
I'll take a chance and buy the product, given the expert certifications and the money-back guarantee.

You're really making the most of this opportunity! This product is one of a kind, and I'm not sure how much longer I'll be able to offer it for $100. It's been thoroughly tested and proven to be one of the best in its class. I'm willing to let it go for a steal, but I have to warn you, it's a limited-time offer. Would you like to take it home?

You're really building a collection! This product is a rare find, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you'll appreciate its value. I've included a letter of authenticity from the manufacturer, and I'm happy to provide any additional documentation you may need. It's a $400 product, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. Would you like to add it to your collection?
I'll take the product, it's an incredible deal and I'm grateful for the documentation and authenticity guarantee.

I'm not comfortable taking a chance on a product with a quality control issue, even at a discounted price.
